name: Akumo of Thunder Bluff
rules: On your turn: 3, Flip Akumo -> Ready target ally.

name: Cleanse Spirit
rules: Destroy target ability. If you do, your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Inferno Totem
rules: At the start of your turn, this Totem deals 4 fire damage to target opposing hero.
reprinted: Twilight of the Dragons,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Leisha of Darnassus
rules: On your turn: 3, Flip Leisha -> Leisha has Assault 3 this turn. (She has +3 ATK on your turn.)

name: Jaral of Gilneas
rules: On your turn: 2, Flip Jaral -> Jaral deals 3 nature damage to target ally with cost 4 or more.

name: Rumi of Gnomeregan
rules: On your turn: 4, Flip Rumi -> Rumi deals 2 fire damage to target hero and 2 fire damage to up to one target ally.

name: Saria of Stormwind
rules: On your turn: 5, Flip Saria -> Target opposing ally deals melee damage to itself equal to its ATK.

name: Kaave of the Exodar
rules: On your turn: 4, Flip Kaave -> Kaave heals 3 damage from each hero and ally you control.

name: Baeltor of the Undercity
rules: On your turn: 2, Flip Baeltor -> Opposing allies have -1 ATK this turn.

name: Frizlix of Kezan
rules: On your turn: 2, Flip -> Exhaust target hero or ally.

name: Kalia of Silvermoon City
rules: On your turn: 3, Flip Kalia -> Target player discards a card at random.

name: Gurzak of Orgrimmar
rules: On your turn: 2, Flip Gurzak -> Target weapon has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Adrenaline Rush
rules: Combat Hero Required; Ready all of your resources. Draw cards until you reach your maximum hand size. At end of turn, discard your hand.
flavour: Let'sget'em! Whatarewewaitingfor? Gogogo!

name: Aggressive Exploitation
rules: Your hero deals 4 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.
flavour: Dud you really expect me to fight fair? - Vorix Zorbuzz

name: Carnage
rules: Destroy each opposing ally with cost 4 or less.

name: Censure
rules: Put target opposing attacking ally into its owner's hand.
flavour: Anyone so easily dismissed is unworthy of defeat at my hands. - Rekwa Proudhorn

name: Circle of Healing
rules: Holy Hero Required; Your hero heals 10 damage from each friendly hero and ally.
flavour: All your effort has been wasted.

name: Crushing Strike
rules: Destroy target opposing equipment. If you do, your hero may deal 3 melee damage to its controller's hero.
flavour: Armor can do only so much. - Peter Hottelet

name: Deadly Poison
rules: Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 nature damage to attached character.

name: Death Coil
rules: Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally. Ready a Ghoul in your party.

name: Drain Essence
rules: Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally and heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt this way.

name: Elemental Precision
rules: Elemental Hero Required;Ongoing: If a hero or ally in your party would deal nature [Nature] damage, it deals double that much instead.
flavour: Nature cannot be mastered. But with patience, it can be persuaded.

name: Fan of Knives
rules: Your hero deals 2 ranged damage to each opposing hero and ally. On your turn: Discard a weapon -> Put this ability from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Gift of the Earthmother
rules: Restoration Hero Required; Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +6/+6. When attached ally is destroyed, draw two cards.

name: Gift of the Wild
rules: Ongoing: Allies in your party have +2 ATK / +2 health.

name: Ice Lance
rules: Your hero deals 2 frost damage to target ally, or 6 if that ally is ready.
reprinted: Drums Of War,Class Starter Deck 2010,Champion Decks
flavour: It's hard to nail a moving target. An immobile one, though…Now that's a different story. - Velindra Sepulchre

name: Heal
rules: Your hero heals 7 damage from target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Twilight of the Dragons
flavour: One simple touch can mend so much.

name: Holy Shock
rules: Holy Hero Required; Prevent the next 4 damage that target friendly hero or ally would be dealt this turn.; Your hero deals 4 unpreventable holy damage to target opposing hero or ally.

name: Infusion of Earth
rules: Attach to target ally or weapon you control.;Ongoing: Attached card has Assault 3.

name: Juggernaut
rules: Arms Hero Required; Exhaust all opposing heroes and allies. Your hero has Assault 3 this turn.
flavour: Now you die! - Gorebelly

name: Master of the Hunt
rules: Ongoing: Your Pets have +2 ATK and +2 health.
flavour: A well trained pet is a powerful extension of the hunter's body. Like its master, it's frightening to behold in combat.

name: Nature's Focus
rules: Choose one: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target ally, or your hero heals 4 damage from target hero.

name: Obliterate
rules: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally, or 4 if you control a Disease.

name: Natural Conduit
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target ally and heals 3 damage from itself.

name: Prey on the Weak
rules: Destroy target ally wth cost 4 or less.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Rogues don't much care about fair fights.

name: Seal of Wrath
rules: Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with a weapon, it may also deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Judgement comes for those who harm the innocent. - Rekwa Proudhorn

name: Siphon Life
rules: Affliction Hero Required; Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 shadow damage to attached character and heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt this way.

name: Thorns
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: When attached character is dealt combat damage, it deals 1 nature damage to the source of that combat damage.
flavour: We can learn much from the elder vine, which threatens with barbs the hand that would trim it back.

name: Twist of Faith
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: You control attached ally.
flavour: Your will is weak. Your mind is mine.

name: Unholy Ground
rules: Ongoing: When a non-token ally you control is destroyed, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.
flavour: You had better double your efforts. - Haedis

name: Resurrection
rules: Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.
flavour: May your second chance end better than your first.

name: Wrath of Turalyon
rules: Destroy all allies that attacked this turn.
flavour: Faith alone is not enough to stop the enemies of the Light. - Prince Arthas Menethil

name: Adrienne the Inspiring
rules: 4 -> Target ally has Assault 4 this turn. (It has +4 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: Her indomitable spirit and selflessness rally everyone around her.

name: Andiss Butcherson
rules: You pay 1 less to strike with weapons.
flavour: My advice? Keep your scabbard greased and your blades sharp.

name: Boki Earthgaze
rules: Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)
flavour: Garrosh may be Warchief, but Thrall has done more than enough to earn my loyalty.

name: Brigg
rules: When Brigg deals combat damage to an ally with damage on it, destroy that ally.

name: Crazy Igvand
rules: Protector
flavour: Ye won't be getting past me, laddy!

name: Dark Cleric Jocasta
rules: When Dark Cleric Jocasta enters play, you may put target ally card from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Drandus the Deathcaller
rules: Protector;Ghouls you control have Assault 2.

name: Dread Infernal
rules: When Dread Infernal enters or leaves play, he deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: When the smoke cleared, I wished it hadn't. - Warden Stormclaw

name: Emelia Darkhand
rules: Protector;This ally can't attack unless an opponent controls more allies than you.

name: Erytheis
rules: When Erytheis is destroyed, she deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: My friends are dead. My family is dead. Even I am dead. What do I have left to fear?

name: Gabble
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.)

name: Garell Strout
rules: When Garell Strout attacks, he deals 2 fire damage to target opposing hero.

name: Gerana Sparkfist
rules: When this ally enters play, she deals 1 arcane damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: I'll be needing a little breathing room, if ye don't mind.

name: Jarrod Gravon
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.); 2 -> Ready this ally.
flavour: Gilneas has need of us, now more then ever.

name: Josiah King
rules: 5, Destroy Josiah King -> Josiah deals 3 arcane damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Magic is tied to the fabric of being, so much so that unleashing it is unleashing one's very life force.

name: Kirjen Fizzgar
rules: When this ally enters play, draw a card.
flavour: I've seen many troubling events in my day, lad, but the return of Deathwing trumps them all.

name: Kozik Skullcracker
rules: Stealth

name: Kysa Shadowstalker
rules: When this ally enters play, target hero has Stealth this turn.

name: Lifemender Dorn
rules: Once per turn: 1 -> Dorn heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Compared to the tauren, nature is a fragile creature. For us to live among it, we must practice restraint.

name: Lu'ka de Wall
rules: Protector; When Lu'ka is dealt damage, you may exhaust target hero or ally.
flavour: Oh? Joo and what army, mon?

name: Malistra the Demonmistress
rules: Friendly Pets have +2 ATK.
flavour: A strong mistress can give pets a reason to kill, and a fear of coming back in failure.

name: Mojo Doctor Zin'tar
rules: When Zin'tar attacks, he heals 1 damage from target hero or ally in your party and deals 1 nature damage to target opposing hero or ally.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)

name: Murphy Watson
rules: This ally has Assault 3 while an ally is in your graveyard.

name: Parvink
rules: Protector; When Parvink enters play, draw a card.
flavour: Tauren warriors stand between their allies and death. Gnomes keep death from walking that far.

name: Pithran Mithrilshot
rules: Elusive; Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)
flavour: Watch me hit the last petal on that peacebloom. No, not that one. Farther away, on top of those hills. You can't make it out? Oh, for - just take my word for it, all right?

name: Rantuko Grimtouch
rules: When Rantuko readies, he deals 1 shadow damage to each opposing ally.

name: Talian Bladebender
rules: Opponent's can't strike with weapons.
flavour: Scabbard a little rusty?

name: Tarn Darkwalker
rules: Demons have Ferocity. (They can attack immediately.)
flavour: Send the fiends in first, before they can turn on you.

name: Tesla
rules: Assault 2 (This ally has +2 ATK on your turn.) Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)
flavour: Most wind serpents subsist on a diet of fish, but a good hunter can offer much more interesting prey.

name: Toz'jun
rules: Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)
flavour: Stand back, bruddah, or joo gonna get caught in da mojo.

name: Tyrus Lionheart
rules: Protector; Tyrus has +4 ATK while defending.

name: Wysko
rules: Your weapons have +1 ATK while your hero is attacking.

name: Zakis Trickstab
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.) Stealth (This ally can't be protected against.)
flavour: You wanna know what's a one-sided trade? Stealing, that's what.

name: Zerzu
rules: When this ally enters play, she heals all damage from [Nature] allies you control.
flavour: Life always be shining through, mon, even in da darkest of times.

name: Citadel Enforcer's Claymore
flavour: Marrowgar had no idea the power that lay amongst the bones of his slain enemies.  - Ayaka Winterhoof

name: Greathelm of the Scourge Champion
rules: When Greathelm of the Scourge Champion is destroyed, you may put it from its owner's graveyard into his hand at the start of the next turn.

name: Masterwork Stormhammer
rules: 5, [Exhaust] -> Your hero deals 1 nature damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies.
flavour: It is said the greatest weaponsmiths leave a piece of themselves in every weapon they create.

name: Reanimator's Hacker
rules: 2, Destroy this weapon -> Put target ally from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Wand of the Forgotten Star
rules: When combat damage is dealt with Wand of the Forgotten Star to a hero, that hero's controller puts that many cards from the top of his deck into his graveyard.

name: Scorch
rules: Your hero deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010,Through the Dark Portal (EA)
flavour: All magi are pyromaniacs...at least a little bit.

name: Sinister Strike
rules: Your hero deals X melee damage to target hero or ally, where X is 1 plus the ATK of one of your Melee weapons.
flavour: Is adds injury to insult.

name: Thunder Clap
rules: Your hero deals 1 melee damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way has -1 ATK this turn.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Trophy Kill
rules: Destroy target ally with cost 4 or more.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Hunters pride themselves on felling the most dangerous beasts.

name: Whirlwind
rules: Your hero deals melee damage to each opposing ally equal the ATK of one of your Melee weapons.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: All men enter, no men leave.

name: Blight Bringers
rules: Up to thee target allies have -3 ATK this turn.
flavour: Beware their claws - even the slightest touch can be debilitating! - Vanira Raventhorne

name: Gargoyle
rules: Unholy Talent (You can't put Blood Talents or Frost Talents in your deck.);Ferocity;At the end of your turn, if this ally is undamaged, put him into his owner's hand.

name: Sanguine Presence
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Protector and +10 [Health].;1, [Exhaust] -> Ready your hero.
flavour: Da elements will fear da face of death, just as all else do. - Zin'sil

name: Savage Cat Form
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Assault 1 and Stealth.;(It has +1 ATK on your turn and can't be protected against.)
flavour: The desecration of the shrines of the ancients shall not go unpunished. - Arturius Hathrow

name: Cobra Shot
rules: Your hero deals nature damage to target hero or ally equal to the combined ATK of a Pet and a Ranged weapon you control.
flavour: As if one or the other wasn't enough by itself. - Almia Moonwhisper

name: Loque
rules: Beast Mastery Talent (You can't put Marksmanship Talents or Survival Talents in your deck.);Elusive, Stealth, Untargetable;Damage that this ally would deal is unpreventable.

name: Arcane Barrage
rules: Arcane Talent (You can't put Fire Talents or Frost Talents in your deck.);This ability can't be interrupted.;Your hero deals 4 arcane damage to target hero or ally.;You may play this ability from your graveyard. If you do, the next time it would enter a graveyard from anywhere, remove it from the game instead.
flavour: We must end this elemental threat, one way or another. - Jinxy Blastwheel

name: Fel Flame
rules: Ongoing: When this ability enters play, your Hero deals 2 unpreventable shadowfire damage to target hero or ally.;2 -> [Shadow] and [Fire] cards you control have +1 ATK this turn.

name: Axar
rules: Elusive(This ally can't be attacked.)
flavour: Outland burned under the foot of the Burning Legion; now Azeroth burns with the fury of the elements.

name: Dominic Kandor
rules: When this ally enters play, target ally has -2 ATK this turn.;Protector(This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

name: Gully Rustinax
rules: Protector(This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);Elusive(This ally can't be attacked.)

name: Lordbane Scepter
rules: When you play an ability, this weapon has +2 ATK this turn.
flavour: It channels my power as if it were an extension of myself. - Olivia Damescas

name: Chain Lightning
rules: Target up to three heroes and/or allies. Your hero deals 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.;(received errata)
flavour: The air crackled with electricity as the bolt leapt from body to body, leaving the scent of charred flesh in its wake.

name: Counterspell
rules: Interrupt target ability card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive (EA),Archive
flavour: No voodoo for you, mon. - Ta'zo

name: Dismantle
rules: Destroy target equipment.
flavour: With one well-timed strike, any opponent can be stripped of his defenses. - The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 2

name: Dispel Magic
rules: Destroy target ability.
flavour: A fool and her blessings are soon parted.

name: Distract
rules: Exhaust all allies in target player's party. Each of those allies can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Misdirection is the art of making someone see or hear what isn't there.

name: Earth's Bounty
rules: Put target card from your graveyard into your hand.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: The earth speaks to me. It will grant me what I need.

name: Energize
rules: Target player draws two cards.
flavour: A taste of the refreshing energies of the Emerald Dream.

name: Fear
rules: Put target opposing ally into its owner's hand.
flavour: It fled without a wordunless AAAAAGH! counts as a word.

name: Alecia Hall
rules: When Alecia enters play, she heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.
reprinted: Hunt For Illidan,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: It appears I have arrived with time to spare.

name: Acid Hands McGillicutty
rules: When Acid Hands is destroyed, you may destroy target equipment.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Wrath
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive
flavour: Nature's fury is awesome to behold.

name: Shadow Bolt
rules: Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally.;When that character is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive
flavour: May darkness take you, for when I'm done, the Light will not recognize you. - Radak Doombringer

name: Polymorph
rules: Attach to target ally.; Attached ally can't attack or protect, loses all powers, and is a sheep.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Baaaaa.

name: Mark of the Wild
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK and +2 health.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: May Cenarius smile upon you. - Archdruid Hamuul Runetotem

name: Mana Agate
rules: Ongoing: 1, Destroy Mana Agate -> Draw 2 cards.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks
flavour: Magi are unique in their ability to store mana for future use without alchemical aid.

name: Lightning Bolt
rules: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Shamans know that lightning can strike twice in the same place.

name: Life Tap
rules: As an additional cost to play Life Tap, put 2 damage on your hero.; Draw two cards.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive
flavour: When the dark arts cal for flesh, you can only trust your own.

name: Immolate
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 1 fire damage to it.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character.
reprinted: Fires of Outland,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Holy Light
rules: Your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.; Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: The third and most important of the Light's virtues is compassion. - Uther the Lightbringer

name: Hammer of Justice
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.; Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive
flavour: Justice in Azeroth is in short supply, but merciless when it does arrive.

name: Gouge
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Every being has vulnerable spots; make it your business to know them all. -The assassin's Creed, Chapter 2

name: Frostbolt
rules: Your hero deals 3 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks
flavour: Wearing heavy plate is taxing enough without having to lug around another eighty pounds of ice. - Warrax

name: Frost Shock
rules: Your hero deals 2 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or protect this turn.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: There is only one kind of cold the dwarves of Dun Morogh fear.

name: Flash Heal
rules: Your hero heals 4 damage from target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Fireball
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 4 fire damage to it.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Twilight of the Dragons,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Fire Blast
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive

name: Execute
rules: Destroy target ally with damage on it.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010,Champion Decks
flavour: Showing weakness to a warrior is a death sentence.

name: Entangling Roots
rules: Attach to target ally and exhaust it.; Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks
flavour: The vines grew angry, as if every weed of Azeroth sought revenge upon those who would destroy their fertile home.

name: Chain Heal
rules: Target up to three heroes and/or allies. Your hero heals 3, 2, and 1 damage from them, respectively.
reprinted: Fires of Outland,War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Battle Shout
rules: Ongoing: Allies in your party have +1 ATK.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: For Lordaeron! For Khaz Modan! For the Horde! Azeroth has heard them all.

name: Arcane Shot
rules: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally.; Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,War of the Elements,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010,Champion Decks
flavour: A hunter's deadly accuracy doesn't just seem like magic; sometimes, it is.

name: Captain Swash
rules: Swash has +3 ATK while attacking an exhausted hero or ally.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: 'Dashing' isn't a word I'd use to describe an orc - unless he were running. - Kintara Wintermoon

name: Bloodclaw
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA)
flavour: The eyes of a raptor reveal a feral, vicious intelligence at work.

name: Braxiss the Sleeper
rules: Elusive
flavour: I'm awake. I'm awake.

name: Bizzazz
rules: When Bizzazz enters play, draw a card.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Bloodblade
rules: Bloodblade can attack only heroes.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Benethor Draigo
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: In life he cooked meat for his brothers. In death he cooked his brothers for meat.

name: Apprentice Teep
rules: Elusive (Can't be Attacked)
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Archive

name: Anika Berlyn
flavour: Most paladins would gladly live and die as Uther did.

name: Maazhum
rules: When this ally enters play, he deals 3 shadow damage to target hero and heals 3 damage from your hero.
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Infiltrate
rules: Up to two target heroes and/or allies have Assault 2 and Stealth this turn. (They have +2 ATK on your turn and can't be protected against.)
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Stick to the shadows. You'll live a lot longer that way. - Zimzi the Trickster

name: Expel
rules: Your hero deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to target ally for each ally you control.
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Horn of Winter
rules: Heroes and allies you control have Assault 1 this turn. They have +1 ATK on your turn.)
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: The last sound you'll hear before death grips your soul. - Ayaka Winterhoof

name: What Illidan Wants, Illidan Gets
rules: If a Demon is in your party, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: You're going to have to act your heart out. - Borok, Son of Oronok

name: The Key to Freedom
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: The small brass key looks simple enough.

name: The Ichor of Undeath
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put target ally from your graveyard into your hand.

name: The Grimtotem Weapon
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed equipment into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: I'll loan the totem to you if you agree to help me test it. - Apprentice Garion

name: The Essence of Enmity
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: The creatures you seek swarn over the Den of Flame to the northwest and the Stonemaul Ruins to the north. - Brogg

name: Mystery Goo
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: The greenish substance inside the caukdron appears to be similar to what you found in the flask.

name: Brothers in Death
rules: On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Remove target ally in a graveyard from the game. If you do, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.

name: Blueleaf Tubers
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Shuffle your graveyard into your deck.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks
flavour: Those tubers are impossible to find unless you know just where to look. That's why I've trained these snufflenose gophers to find them for me.

name: Edgemaster's Handguards
rules: You pay 1 less to strike with weapons.
flavour: These invaluable handguards steady even the most unskilled of hands.

name: Zulanji
flavour: Joo have to learn to trust me, mon!

name: Angry Dread
rules: When this weapon enters play, you may draw a card.

name: Vala Carville
flavour: I've spent a lifetime studying, and now it's time to show you what I've learned.

name: Terina Calin
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control an equipment, you may destroy target equipment.

name: Tez Tez the Patchmonger
rules: When Tez Tez enters play, target opposing ally has -3 ATK this turn.
flavour: I share da voodoo wit choo, mon, no charge.

name: Oruk Starstorm
flavour: The moon is always within my call.

name: Nethermaven Donna Chastain
rules: Assault 3

name: Onnekra Bloodfang
rules: Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.) This ally can attack only heroes.
flavour: Her single-mindedness is her greatest strength.

name: Laenthor Shademoon
flavour: The Highborne have been in hiding for too long. It is time for them to rejoin their brethren.

name: Kistix Shockvat
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.)
flavour: Don't get me wrong - I love explosives, but sometimes you just gotta work with your hands.

name: Ka'tali Stonetusk
rules: Protector; At the start of your turn, Ka'tali Stonetusk heals 1 damage from himself.
flavour: You come get the voodoo.

name: Jinie Swizzleshade
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.)
flavour: Let's see how the raging elements handle a heavy dose of the shadows.

name: Hira
flavour: The flames dance before my fingertips like puppets dance for their master.

name: Guardian Steelhoof
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.) This ally can't attack.
flavour: The land cries out to us for protection. Who are you to ignore her?

name: Drizzie Steelslam
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);When this ally enters play, you may put target equipment into its owner's hand.
flavour: Such shoddy craftsmanship! Clearly gnomish in nature.

name: Doom
rules: Assault 4 (This ally has +4 ATK on your turn)

name: Chops
rules: When Chops attacks, you may exhaust target hero or ally.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Through the Dark Portal (EA)
flavour: I can't see who's winnin' - but it's probably not the guy under the boar.

name: Alador Stonebrew
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: Times are tough, lad, but I'll always have yer back.

name: Rend
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 melee damage to attached character.
flavour: I gave him a choice: die piece by piece, or all at once. - Gorebelly

name: Power Word: Vigor
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +5 [Health].
flavour: Maybe this will help keep you from dying so easily. - Xerandaal, Shade Servitor

name: Frost Fever
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to attached hero. Allies in attached hero's party lose and can't have Assault and Mend.

name: Fel Blaze
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to each non-Demon hero and ally.
flavour: These unholy alliances are not without their rewards. - Victor Baltus

name: Crippling Shot
rules: Target hero or ally has -5 ATK this turn.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: A well-placed shot can weaken the strongest arm and slow the swiftest hand.

name: Cold Front
rules: Allies can't attack this turn.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: I'll freeze you all! - The Shade of Aran

name: Chasten
rules: Your hero deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.

name: Blood Chill
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to attached hero. If damage is dealt this way, exhaust each opposing hero or ally with Protector.

name: Blessing of Might
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: Attached character has +1 ATK while attacking.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Twilight of the Dragons,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Bestowed upon the worthy, increased might can facilitate great deeds.

name: Armed to the Teeth
rules: Your hero deals melee damage to target ally equal to 3 plus the number of equipment you have.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Entrenched
rules: If you control an ally: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks
flavour: Diamant says you are to be trusted. Diamant is patient and wise, so I shall allow you to prove yourself. - Kor the Immovable

name: A Bird In Hand
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an ally, put it into your hand.
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: The Harpies communicate across the ridge using a series of signal fires. If we extinguish one, Marion is sure to come investigate. - Thisalee Crow

name: Burom Bladeseer
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: In my deepest meditations, I hear the faint voice of Thrall as he tries to keep all of Azeroth from breaking.

name: Nikka Blastbor
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: There is no shortage of prey for me here on these Lost Isles.

name: Patricia Potter
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: I shall embrace the fire and harness its power to do my bidding!

name: Jeniva Prescott
rules: When this ally enters play, she may heal 4 damage from target hero or ally.
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: I may not be able to lift this curse, but that does not mean the Light has abandoned me.

name: Dagin Bootzap
rules: When this ally enters play, he deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Make the first shot count, laddie.

name: Cerwyn
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Evey blade of grass in the Emerald Dream holds a lesson. I could spend an eternity there and still have more to learn.

name: Firewarden Wyland Kaslinth
rules: Assault 1 (+1 ATK on your turn)

name: Fungus Face McGillicutty
rules: When Fungus Face is destroyed, you may destroy target ability.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Death hasn't robbed the Forsaken of the ability to understand what you say. They're just not likely to listen.

name: Guruvan
rules: Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)
flavour: May the naaru guide my aim.

name: Gurzuk
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),March of the Legion (EA)

name: Kagra of the Crossroads
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately)
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Karkas Deathhowl
rules: When Karkas Deathhowl enters play, you may put target ally into its owner's hand.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Karrok Scarrend
flavour: The more, the merrier - Scarrend family motto

name: Kor Cindervein
flavour: By my beard, those who forge their own blessings need never beg for them.

name: Moko Hunts-at-Dawn
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: The early hunter catches the bird catching the worm.

name: Orono the Great
reprinted: Drums Of War Starter,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: The spark of fire and the chill of frost.

name: Petreus Roffe
rules: Protector

name: Priestess Katianna
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.)
reprinted: Drums Of War Starter,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Perhaps you should jump at shadows.

name: Sarmoth
rules: Opposing heroes and allies that can attack Sarmoth can attack only Sarmoth.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive
flavour: Voidwalkers do not fear pain, so they are popular with warlocks who do.

name: Sha'lin Nightwind
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.)

name: Skronk Skullseeker
rules: Skronk has +3 ATK while attacking an exhausted hero or ally.
flavour: One man's skull is this orc's trophy.

name: Taz'dingo
rules: When Taz'Dingo enters play, he deals 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Trixie Boltclunker
rules: Protector

name: Tyrennius Scatheblade
rules: Protector
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),March of the Legion (EA)

name: Valanos
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Kodo and stag? HA! Try hunting clefthoof and talbuk.

name: Vanda Skydaughter
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Nature isn't just around you. It's above you as well.

name: Varah, Fury of the Stars
rules: Assault 2 (+2 ATK on your turn)

name: Waz'luk
rules: When Waz'luk enters play, he deals 1 fire damage to target hero.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks,Archive
flavour: He makes quite a first impression.

name: Zygore Bladebreaker
rules: When Zygore Bladebreaker enters play, you may destroy target armor or weapon.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA)

name: Ancient Bone Bow
rules: When you strike with Ancient Bone Bow, your hero has Long-Range this combat. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)
flavour: Handed down from ancestor to ancestor, this bow has seen many enemies fall before it.

name: Arcanite Reaper
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Heroes of Azeroth (EA)
flavour: The arcanite reaper was long the mark of a true warrior in Azeroth. Having one crafted was like a rite of passage.

name: Barman Shanker
rules: Barman Shanker has +2 ATK while your hero is attacking an exhausted hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Property of the Grim Guzzler Tavern.

name: Blackcrow
rules: When you strike with Blackcrow, your hero has Long-Range this combat. (Defenders deal on combat damage to it.)
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks
flavour: This crossbow was once a weapon of the shadow hunter Vosh'gajin

name: Bloodbane's Fall
rules: Your hero has Assault 1. (+1 ATK on your turn.)
reprinted: ScourgeWar,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks

name: Crimson Shocker
rules: When Crimson Shocker enters play, your hero may deal 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: The heat of the Molten Core shimmers inside the wand's glowing tip.

name: Fel Iron Hatchet
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010,Through the Dark Portal (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Even the metals of Outland carry with them the taint of the Burning Legion.

name: Golem Skull Helm
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: A trophy from the golem Panzer, bouncer for the Grim Guzzler.

name: Perdition's Blade
rules: When Perdition's Blade enters play, your hero deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Scarlet Kris
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Its secret is that the blood of its victims keeps the scarlet color bright.
